instructions.usage: These test users can be used for testing the Kelmah platform
instructions.verification: Users need email verification before they can log in
instructions.adminAccess: Use admin endpoints to bypass verification for testing
instructions.profiles: Each user has complete profile data including skills, portfolio, and certifications
